lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton accused Mr. Trump of feigning support for working Americans, saying his tax proposals would “give trillions in tax breaks to people like himself.”

byline.contributor: Amy Chozick reported from Warren, and Alan Rappeport from Washington.
byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and ALAN RAPPEPORT

headline.print_headline: Clinton Rejects Trump Policies as Aiding Rich
headline.main: In Michigan, Hillary Clinton Calls Donald Trump Enemy of ‘the Little Guy’

snippet: Mrs. Clinton accused Mr. Trump of feigning support for working Americans, saying his tax proposals would “give trillions in tax breaks to people like himself.”...
abstract: Hillary Clinton delivers economic address and offers point-by-point rebuttal of Donald Trump's economic policies, accusing him of disingenuously characterizing himself as friend to working class while pushing policies that benefit wealthy; Clinton focuses particularly on Trump's tax policies.
